description: Detects commands that temporarily turn off Volume Snapshots Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Disabled Volume Snapshots
query: (process.command_line:*reg* AND process.command_line:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line:*\\Services\\VSS\\Diag* AND process.command_line:*\/d\ Disabled*)
